Questions for Big Data

I ask my banking app for my balance.

“Why?” it replies.

Such petulance from an interface, as if I hadn’t spent the morning thinking how to approach him, as if I hadn’t toiled hours working up the confidence.

“Does my face no longer meet your eyes? My features distant?”

“Tell me, then, in which city is your vacation home?”

Gender Ecstatica

In culpa qui labore magna sit amet cillum anim aute exercitation. Dolor laborum velit et proident culpa occaecat ex. Excepteur deserunt velit aliquip quis veniam.

Running from Congress
Move through life in the color Green

Usually, it involves me looking to my side, keeping a forward stride, a sort of delicate dance to keep vertical. A dance I do with you, you always by my side, my partner, your beautiful green eyes.
